foto_perfil

Just like the FileDescriptor, but for ImageFields. The only difference is assigning the width/height to the width_field/height_field, if appropriate.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a one-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Restaurant(Model):
    place = OneToOneField(Place, related_name='restaurant')

Restaurant.place is a ForwardOneToOneDescriptor instance.

mascotas

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

Accessor to the related object on the forward side of a many-to-one or one-to-one (via ForwardOneToOneDescriptor subclass) relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.

seguimiento_set

Accessor to the related objects manager on the reverse side of a many-to-one relation.

In the example:

class Child(Model):
    parent = ForeignKey(Parent, related_name='children')

Parent.children is a ReverseManyToOneDescriptor instance.

Most of the implementation is delegated to a dynamically defined manager class built by create_forward_many_to_many_manager() defined below.

usuarios.tests module

class usuarios.tests.AuthenticationViewTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: TestCase

Verifica el flujo de registro y login.

setUp()

Hook method for setting up the test fixture before exercising it.

test_login_admin_success_redirect_dashboard()

Asegura que un admin logueado redirige al admin_panel:dashboard.

test_login_success_redirect_home()

Asegura que un login exitoso redirige correctamente al home (si no es admin).

test_register_adoptante_success(MockRegistroForm)

Asegura que la vista de registro de Adoptante crea el User y el perfil.

test_register_refugio_success(MockRegistroRefugioForm)

Asegura que el registro de Refugio cree el User y el perfil Refugio.

class usuarios.tests.PerfilModelTests(methodName='runTest')

Bases: TestCase

Verifica que los modelos Adoptante y Refugio se creen correctamente y mantengan la relación OneToOne con el User de Django.

test_create_adoptante_profile()

Asegura la creación correcta de un perfil Adoptante.

test_create_refugio_profile()

Asegura la creación correcta de un perfil Refugio.

usuarios.urls module

usuarios.views module

usuarios.views.admin_dashboard(request)

Dashboard para el administrador. Redirige a la vista de administración de Django, pero puede extenderse para mostrar estadísticas, links directos a modelos, etc.

usuarios.views.cambiar_contrasena(request)
usuarios.views.desactivar_cuenta(request)

Permite al adoptante desactivar su cuenta (sin eliminarla).

usuarios.views.descargar_datos(request, formato='json')
usuarios.views.editar_perfil(request)
usuarios.views.editar_perfil_refugio(request)

Permite a un usuario de tipo Refugio editar su perfil y la info del User asociado.

usuarios.views.es_refugio(user)

Verifica si el usuario logueado está asociado a un perfil Refugio.
